overview: A multimillion-dollar business, a beautiful young wife, and all the trappings of success should make any man happy, but Ansu is a serial adulterer and it is breaking Amie, his young wifeâ€™s heart. For Ansu, prevention is the key when playing around with other women, but he fails to realise that what he fears the most will haunt his heart forever because one wrong move is all it takes.
title: Prevention
